scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node server/dist/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "COMMON,CLIENT,SERVER" --prefix-colors "yellow,green,blue" --kill-others  "npm run dev:common" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.install: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run install:common
